name: TextStyleRanges

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the TextStyleRange.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the TextStyleRange with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the TextStyleRanges within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The TextStyleRange, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TextStyleRange, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The TextStyleRange, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TextStyleRange, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first TextStyleRange in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last TextStyleRange in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle TextStyleRange in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the TextStyleRange with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the TextStyleRange that follows the desired TextStyleRange.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the TextStyleRange whose index follows the specified TextStyleRange in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The TextStyleRange whose index comes before the desired TextStyleRange.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any TextStyleRange in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every TextStyleRange in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextStyleRange.
Returns the TextStyleRange with the specified index.

description: A collection of text style ranges.
